column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Overall great experience. The atmosphere of the restaurant is amazing
column2: the menu is good and very reasonably priced for Chicago
column3: and the service was excellent. Had the fried chicken entree
column4: which was comfort food in all its glory and perfection. Sides of asparagus and mac and cheese
column5: both of which were very good. Portions are very generous here - even entrees could be easily shared. Would definitely go back!
